meanings.definition: The quality of being peculiar or unusual in an interesting way.
meanings.sent1: Her quirkiness made her stand out in a good way.
meanings.sent2: I love the quirkiness of her fashion sense.
meanings.sent3: His quirkiness in always wearing mismatched socks never fails to make me smile.
meanings.sent4: The quirkiness of the old bookstore transported me to another time.
meanings.sent5: The quirkiness of the town's annual parade left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.definition: A peculiar trait or characteristic that sets someone or something apart.
meanings.sent1: The cat's quirkiness of chasing its tail amused us all.
meanings.sent2: His quirkiness in collecting vintage toys was well-known in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The quirkiness of her habit of alphabetizing her book collection by color was endearing.
meanings.sent4: The quirkiness of the clock that ran backwards symbolized the town's unique spirit.
meanings.sent5: The quirkiness of the treehouse with a slide instead of stairs was a hit with the kids.
